references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive introduction to PAC-Bayes bounds, which are central to the current work.

references.paper_title: Concentration inequalities: A nonasymptotic theory of independence
references.reason: This book offers fundamental concentration inequalities used in the theoretical analysis of the paper.
This paper significantly extended PAC-Bayesian theory and its applications, providing a foundation for the current work.
This paper is a foundational work in PAC-Bayesian theory, providing the initial theoretical framework.
This work introduced PAC-Bayesian model averaging, which is a key concept in the current work.
